txt.en: The fortress of Skarháld is under attack! Durin raced ahead and already engages in battle at the bottom of the stairs.
Fight alongside Durin at Skarháld
'Fire!'
'Show them no quarter!'
Durin fights against the onslaught of dragon-kind at the upper courtyard of the fortress and needs your help.
'Hold!'
'Now!'

'It is done, [placeholder]. Karazgar could have slain us all, killed to the very last dwarf, but he chose to spare us instead. Hah! It is no mercy. He seeks to use fear as a weapon against us.\n\n'Alas for Bótuz Frostblood! We must not let the Zhélruka despair at his loss, or the fortress is as good as fallen. I tell you dwarves are resilient. May we prove it!'
'Three cheers for Bótuz!'

'It is done, [placeholder]. Karazgar could have slain us all, killed to the very last dwarf, but he chose to spare us instead. Hah! It is no mercy. He seeks to use fear as a weapon against us.\n\n'Alas for Bótuz Frostblood! We must not let the Zhélruka despair at his loss, or the fortress is as good as fallen. You know that our people are resilient. We must now prove it!'
Before the dwarves at Skarháld have had the chance to properly prepare, Karazgar launches the first of his promised attacks upon the fortress.
'None can stand against Bótuz Frostblood!'

'Karazgar left us no time to prepare! But how has he brought these drakes and dragons to bear against us? Let us drive off these winged beasts and prove to the Weeping Warrior that dwarves cannot be intimidated so easily... neither Longbeard nor Zhélruka!'
'Fear the wrath of the Zhélruka!'
'Ha ha! We fear no dragons!'
Catch up to Durin at the bottom of the stairs
'Our captain has the victory!'
'Look!'
'To battle! Defend the fortress!'
Talk to Durin in the upper courtyard of the fortress
Durin has seen that the dwarves operating the siege defences are in need of help, and asked you to attend to them.
Fight alongside Durin at Skarháld
At Karazgar's signal the dragon-kind retreat, their victory assured and unnecessary to prove
'[placeholder], over here!'
'Here come more drakelings!'
The drakes and other dragon-kind have begun to overwhelm Skarháld. Durin calls for you to help him turn the tide.
'I do not understand how Karazgar could command an army this size!'
Talk to Durin in the courtyard at Skarháld
'[placeholder], the dwarves operating the siege defences need your help!'

'What do we do? I know what we must not do... we must not give in to despair! But anyone can see there are too many drakes and not enough dwarves to repel them. Think! We must think! How can we drive them away from the fortress? What would Uncle Náin do? Bah! I cannot think of anything!\n\n'Come with me, [placeholder]! I saw Bótuz Frostblood fighting down below. Let us go to him and see if he has a plan!'
'How has he compelled the service of this dragon-brood?'
'[placeholder], come with me! We will find Bótuz Frostblood!'
'This way! Bótuz fights a mighty drake ahead of us!'
'We have the victory! And look! Bótuz triumphs as well!'
'A single worm lies in our way, [placeholder]!'
'There have always been dragons in the Grey Mountains.'
'They... they are leaving!'
'Dwarves have warred with dragons for centuries!'
'But never before have dragon-kind served one such as Karazgar!'
'Ha! Take that, beast!'
'Worms crawl upon the stairs!'
'Not even dragon-kind can withstand my might.'
'Behold the wrath of Karazgar!'
'I will return... as promised.'
The siege defences are being overrun!
Bótuz Frostblood fights among his people in an upper courtyard of the fortress, but the drakes and other dragon-kind do not relent.
Durin is in the courtyard of Skarháld. Most of the dragon-kind army has retreated.
'This way! This way! We must help with the siege defences!'
'It is not safe up here! The beasts smash our defences to pieces!'
'Durin! What do we do?'
'Good luck to you, and to us all!'
'Keep firing, Zhélruka! [placeholder], we are in trouble.'
'Is this Karazgar's doing? How does he command so many drakes?'
'We will not have enough bolts to slay them all!'
'Help me with this!'
Talk to Durin in the upper courtyard of the fortress
Fight alongside Durin at Skarháld
Durin has been defeated!
Durin has been defeated!
'No!'
'Oh no!'
'Bótuz!'
'Captain!'
Instance: The First Promise
Climb the central platform and assist the dwarves operating the siege defences
